message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm initially offering it for $1,500,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.
I understand your perspective, Bob, but the value of this product to your business shouldn't be underestimated. I could consider coming down to $1,350,000.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $1,200,000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.
